1.1.name: wordpress/blueline
1.1.description: Blueline WordPress theme, two-columns, fixed-width, conservative, widget-ready sidebar, custom background, custom menus, custom header, comment on page, left sidebar, Footer on post with tags, catagories, Header on post with images and "Edit" link, Comments with speech bubble
